document.full_text: after three days of debate, republicans in the iowa house passed a bill that would limit collective bargaining by public sector workers and require them to pay $100 a month toward their health care.
document.title: iowa house passes union curbs, but senate ok doubtful
lines_and_colors: after three days of debate, republicans in the iowa house passed a bill that would limit collective bargaining by public sector workers and require them to pay $100 a month toward their health care.
